column4: Icannot use spacebar while holding shift or capslock is on. I change to a TTY without X and it works fine.

i dont hold shift constantly or type in all caps = )

IAMHOLDINGSHIFTWHILETYPINGANDPRESSINGSPACEBAR
well dont hold shift then?
use the shift key to make the letter capital, then type a letter, then delete it and use the space?
something is broke in Xconf
